### A few logical expressions 

Hi there! 

```{r}
# Is 5 equal to 1?
5 == 1

#does cat match dog?
"cat" == "dog"

meds <- c(1, 2, 3, 4, 5)
meds == 3
meds == 1 | meds > 3 

teddy <- 5
banjo <- 7
tallie <- 4
```

```{r}
teddy <= banjo

```
